meta_description: Matrix $\mathbf{P}$ that is used to transform the standardized coordinates to the original coordinates. Together
with the vector $\mathbf{p}$, found in space_group_3D_origin_shift, the transformation between the standardized
coordinates $\mathbf{x}_s$ and original coordinates $\mathbf{x}$ is then given by $\mathbf{x}_s = \mathbf{P} \
